column5: The Original Old Liberty Schoolhouse was a real schoolhouse in 1917 to 1942. Updated with 21st century conveniences, it offers a most charming relaxing experience. One of the suites is called the Let Freedom Ring Suite. It was added to the schoolhouse in the 1940's. Homemade breakfast is included.  Walk or take short ride to Eagle Mountain Lake, 30 minutes from downtown Fort Worth, 45 minutes from Texas Motor Speedway.  Flat Screen TV, Free Wifi, DVD player, game table and games available.
column8: Freedom Ring Suite at The Old Liberty Schoolhouse
